interface.name: qt_server_buffer
interface.description:
Server buffer is an extension which makes it possible to share a buffer created by the compositor to share it with arbitrary clients. These types of buffers are intended to be read only buffers for clients, but this is an implementation detail.
Server buffers main purpose is to help implement caches
